MS MCQs

    Manage outbound serial and lot numbers in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. How can you apply the FEFO (First-Expired, First-Out) method in a location that is not set up with picks?

      By enabling the Use FEFO option on the Misc. FastTab of the Item Tracking Card page

      By enabling the Pick According to FEFO option on the Bin Policies FastTab of the location card

      By using the Select Entries function if you are assigning serial numbers or lot numbers with expiration dates on outbound orders

      You can only use FEFO for locations that are set up with picks


    2. What function suggests the serial or lot numbers for ship-to customers?

      Assign serial or lot numbers

      Reserve item tracking numbers

      Select item information

      Select Entries
